message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $12,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  $6,000 is quite a bit below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.
I understand your point, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $7,000. Would you be willing to consider $7,200? I think that's a fair compromise.
